column7: Supervised laboratory experiences in health research; individual work under the supervision of members of the faculty in their respective fields. The student assists with data collection, processing, and analysis for research in progress. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated up to a maximum of 12 hours in separate semesters. Prerequisite: Consent of the instructor.
column9: Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated up to a maximum of 12 hours in separate semesters. Prerequisite: Consent of the instructor.
